doc.field: Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs
Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs

The Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs consist of three black-and-white photographic prints showing buildings located in the vicinity of Fulton Street and Clinton Street in the neighborhood of Downtown Brooklyn, 1942 to 1954.

The Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs consist of three black-and-white photographic prints showing buildings located in the vicinity of Fulton Street and Clinton Street in the neighborhood of Downtown Brooklyn, 1942 to 1954.

The Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs consist of three black-and-white photographic prints showing buildings located in the vicinity of Fulton Street and Clinton Street in the neighborhood of Downtown Brooklyn, 1942 to 1954. The Hotel Touraine and the Clinton Garage are shown in the photographs. The photographs are street views and show period cars and trucks.
The collection's digital surrogates should be used in place of the originals whenever possible.
